column1: Fabulous NEWS: #Researchers in @ISRAEL have created a #VACCINE against #CoronaVirus #COVID19 #CoV (& need just 3 weeks to create ALL we'll NEED). And, #Israelis are working in @Italy for the #CoV #TEST to let us know in just 20 MINUTES if someone has/doesn't have the virus!!! https://twitter.com/Jerusalem_Post/status/1233526119837700097
